resources.string: When word is found in the local dictionary, app displays the translation over the original screen.\n(if not found, start the Google translated)
English-Japanese dictionary in the public domain (ejdic-hand)

Browser will open soon.
In the browser, please download the file by tapping the "%1$s".
Download is complete, please return to this screen.
(it does not matter even if you transfer a file that you downloaded in the PC to Android.)
File browser was not found. \nDo you looking for in Google Play?

File selection screen will open soon.\nPlease select a file \"%1$s\" that is in the Download directory.\nIf you are unable to select a file, please install the app found by searching for "filer" in GooglePlay.
I will remove the imported dictionary. \nAre you sure?
Import of dictionary is now complete. \nThe downloaded file can safely be deleted.
I am looking at the clipboard
